docs.lead_paragraph: Alternatives to the popular pill, like intrauterine devices, hormonal implants or injections, may be more convenient, more effective and cheaper in the long run.

headline.seo: Birth Control Doesn’t Have to Mean the Pill
headline.main: Birth Control Doesn’t Have to Mean the Pill
headline.print_headline: Birth Control Doesn’t Have to Mean the Pill

docs.snippet: Alternatives to the popular pill, like intrauterine devices, hormonal implants or injections, may be more convenient, more effective and cheaper in the long run.

docs.lead_paragraph: A scatterbrained romantic comedy stars Jennifer Aniston as a single mother whose young son is not the child of the man she selected as a sperm donor.

headline.seo: Jennifer Aniston Stars in Tale of Fatherhood Mix-Up
headline.main: In a Baste and Switch, a New Father Is Born
headline.print_headline: In a Baste and Switch, A New Father Is Born

docs.snippet: A scatterbrained romantic comedy stars Jennifer Aniston as a single mother whose young son is not the child of the man she selected as a sperm donor.

docs.lead_paragraph: Runners Paula Radcliffe and Kara Goucher are famous for standout performances in the marathon and other events. Now both women, pregnant and due on the same day in September, are also training together during pregnancy.

headline.main: Two Running Stars Train While Pregnant

docs.abstract: Runners Paula Radcliffe and Kara Goucher are best known for standout performances in the marathon and other events. Now both women are pregnant and due on the same day in September, and are also training together during pregnancy.
docs.snippet: Runners Paula Radcliffe and Kara Goucher are best known for standout performances in the marathon and other events. Now both women are pregnant and due on the same day in September, and are also training together during pregnancy.

docs.lead_paragraph: Has Elaine Benes of “Seinfeld,” with her long floral skirts, blazers with padded shoulders and granny shoes with socks, become the summer’s downtown fashion muse?

headline.seo: The Elaine Benes Look Re-appears as New York Style
headline.main: The New Adventures of Old Elaine
headline.print_headline: The New Adventures Of Old Elaine

docs.snippet: Has Elaine Benes of “Seinfeld,” with her long floral skirts, blazers with padded shoulders and granny shoes with socks, become the summer’s downtown fashion muse?

docs.lead_paragraph: A study is the first to link a biomarker for stress with delayed conception in normal, healthy women.

headline.seo: Study Links Stress Biomarker With Delayed Conception
headline.main: Old Maxim of Fertility and Stress Is Reversed
headline.print_headline: Refreshing A Maxim Of Fertility And Stress

docs.snippet: A study is the first to link a biomarker for stress with delayed conception in normal, healthy women.

docs.lead_paragraph: A German singer charged with causing grievous bodily harm to a man who contracted H.I.V. after having unprotected sex with her admitted in court on Monday that she had concealed the fact that she was infected with the virus from the man, and from two other sexual partners.

headline.main: German Pop Singer on Trial for Concealing H.I.V. Status From Sexual Partners

docs.abstract: Nadja Benaissa, a singer with the group No Angels, is in court and facing up to 10 years in prison if found guilty of violating Germany's law against intentional or negligent transmission of H.I.V.
docs.snippet: Nadja Benaissa, a singer with the group No Angels, is in court and facing up to 10 years in prison if found guilty of violating Germany's law against intentional or negligent transmission of H.I.V.
